G CABINST BUSI17ESS.Note "by the- SecretaryoThe Prime Minister has instructed me to notify Mem-bers that, apart from any emergency meeting which may be necessary for any particular question, he proposes to resume regular Meetings of the Cabinet from Tuesday, October l3-t& -The Prime Minister has approved the following provisional programme of business for the Cabinet, Committee of Imperial Defence and the Committee of Civil Research for the week beginning Monday, 12th October.Monday, 12th October, 3 p.m. Committee of Civil Research- Iron and Steel Sub-Committee .Tuesday, 13th October, 11-30 a^m. CabinetcThursday, 15th October,11.30 a.u. Committee of ImperialDefence.3-0 p*m. Singapore Sub-Committee.(Signed) H.P.A. HANKEY,Secretary, CabinetsWhitehall Gardens, S . 1. , . 22nd September, 19S5.
